title: All This and Love
description: Love in many flavors takes center stage in All This and Love. From a wolf hunt in the catacombs beneath an unnamed city to the last kiss shared by a fallen angel and his immortal, human lover, love gets complicated by some of the things that go bump in the night. Explore lust, betrayal and star-crossed romance in five short stories in J. Libby's debut collection.  1. Fallen: a love story 2. this, too, like water and memory 3. like all the girls in the movies 4. to the water and the wild 5. all this and love
author: J. Libby
